channel.title: Galaxy of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the galaxy of the day.

item.title: Pegasus Dwarf Irregular Galaxy
item.description: The Pegasus Dwarf Irregular Galaxy (also known as Peg DIG or the Pegasus Dwarf) is a dwarf irregular galaxy in the direction of the constellation Pegasus. It was discovered by A. G. Wilson in the 1950s. The Pegasus Dwarf is a companion of the Andromeda Galaxy in the Local Group.
